Beene Crl.MC.No. 8809 of 2017 2018/KER/266 APPENDIX PETITIONER(S) ' ANNEXURES : ANNEXURE 1 A TRUE COPY OF THE FIR AND FIS IN POOYAPPALLY POLICE CRIME 1197/2017. ANNEXURE 2 THE AFFIDAVIT OF THE 2ND RESPONDENT DATED 02.11.2017. ANNEXURE 3 THE AFFIDAVIT OF THE 3RD RESPONDENT DATED 02.11.2017. RESPONDENT (S) ' ANNEXURES : NIL / / TRUE COPyY/ / P.S.TO JUDGE Msd. 2018/KER/266 B.KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 4" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioners are accused in Crime No.1197 of 2017 of the Pooyappally Police Station, Kollam District, registered for the offences punishable under Sections 294(b), 323, 324 and 308 IPC read with Section 34 IPC. 2. It seems that the matter has been amicably seitled between the parties. 3. On going through the facts and circumstances of the case, it seems that the matter can be permitted to be settled. It has been reported that no criminal antecedents have been reported against the petitioners. This Court is satisfied that there are no ingredients to invite an offence under Section 308 IPC in the matter. The defacto complainant and the other affected person have filed Annexure-2 and Annexure-3 affidavits affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between them and the petitioners and they have no complaints against the petitioners. Considering the Bee Boker 2018/KER/266 Crl.M.C.No.8809 of 2017 2 fact that the matter has already been settled amicably between the parties, this court is satisfied that no purpose would be served in proceeding with the trial of the case. Matters being so, Annexure-1 First Information Report in Crime No.1197 of 2017 of the Pooyapally Police Station, Kollam District, and all further proceedings in it, as against the petitioners, are liable to be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and Annexure-1 First Information Report in Crime No.1197 of 2017 of the Pooyapally Police Station, Kollam District, and all further proceedings in it, as against the petitioners, are hereby quashed. Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA JUDGE DSV/4/1/18 4/TRUE COPY/ P.A.TO JUDGE
